data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 30033, Version Hash: 9d25a52474116409044621b62923905755015796
data.actual_result: The elements on the left side of the Gift Inventory have no padding/margin when it comes to the left side.
data.expected_result: You're supposed to see your gift inventory, scaled properly from the rest of the elements
data.short_description: The Gift Inventory Window is not scaling properly when in Discord the smallest resolution windowed mode.
data.steps_to_repro: - Resize Discord to Windowed Mode - Make it the Discord Window as small as possible - Navigate to your Gift Inventory
